title: What are Stopwords in Machine Learning?
description: I recently shared an article on Bag Of Words, Stopwords in Machine Learning is another way to get rid of uninformative words by rejecting words that are too frequent to be informative. In this article, I will introduce you to the concept of stopwords in machine learning.
description_lemmatized: recently shared article bag word stopwords machine learning another way get rid uninformative word rejecting word frequent informative article introduce concept stopwords machine learning
